name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset - Prepurchase
name_original: The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset - Prepurchase
description:
Summerset available June 5, 2018.

Pre-purchase The Elder Scrolls® Online: Summerset™ and start playing the full base game right now, plus get the Queen's Bounty Pack and a bonus copy of the Morrowind Chapter for a limited time. Join over 10 million players in the award-winning online multiplayer RPG and experience limitless adventure in a persistent Elder Scrolls world. Travel to the home of the High Elves in the latest Chapter of ESO to save the world from destruction.

• BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE – Chaos reigns over Tamriel. The Imperial Throne sits empty as ancient enemies band together to bring ruin to the mortal world. Take up arms and fight for Tamriel’s salvation.
• JOURNEY TO SUMMERSET – For the first time in history, the home of the High Elves opens its borders to foreign visitors. Travel to Summerset and unravel a dark conspiracy that threatens the world’s existence.
• PLAY THE WAY YOU LIKE – Battle, craft, steal, or explore, and combine different types of equipment and abilities to create your own style of play.
